body:
Hey everyone, I know that a lot of YouTubers have some type of social media account, such as Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook, so I just made one as well.

I know that I can post my videos on there, but what other things can I do to attract an audience, and what should I make tweets about?

I'm fairly new to Twitter, so if you guys could give me suggestions and comments, that would be much appreciated! :D

https://twitter.com/MLGPorkyHD
body_tagged:
Hey everyone, I know that a lot of YouTubers have some type of social media account, such as Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook, so I just made one as well.

I know that I can post my videos on there, but what other things can I do to attract an audience, and what should I make tweets about?

I'm fairly new to Twitter, so if you guys could give me suggestions and comments, that would be much appreciated! :D

https://twitter.com/MLGPorkyHD
title: Twitter Account For YouTube! :D

replies.body: Guys please don't tell me to follow you at this very moment. Maybe I will consider following you if you give me some advice and/or some tips.

replies.body:
How 2 gain followerz


Step 1:  Follow 10000 people

Step 2: Rinse and repeat

replies.body: If you didn't know, the following limits is 2,000 twitter accounts, If you have 2,500 followers you can follow 2,500 accounts, right?

replies.body:
Make more videos.
post said videos on twitter.

wait for people to retweet your videos. Which Is like "sharing" something on Facebook.

you could also try be that one dude that advertises on famous people's twitter posts but I don't recommend that as it is scrubby.
